string.text: A drawing in the style of an ancient Chinese dragon called «Dragon Lore»
The image of a monster called "Speed Beast"
Figure a lightning along the whole body called "Lightning Strike"
Figure jellyfish, similar to the logo "Versace"

%c[255,1,255,255] •% c[default] Old shabby AK-47 
 Occurs in the Zone with updated appearance and technical improvements: 
 
 
%c[255,1,255,255] •%c[ default] Aquamarine Revenge (Stalkers): Increased 5-round magazine, increased damage and caliber: 5.56x45 
 
 
%c[255,1,255,255] •%c[default] Cartel (Bandits): Changing the caliber to 5.45x39 
 
 
%c[255,1,255,255] •%c[default] Elite equipment (Duty): Changing the caliber to 9x39, increased damage 
 
 
%c[255,1,255,255] •%c[default ] Emerald Swirls (Bandits) 
 
 
%c[255,1,255,255] •%c[default] Fire Serpent (Clear Sky): Increased the 15-round magazine, increased damage, caliber change 5.45x39 
 
 
%c [255,1,255,255] •%c[default] Snow Vortex (Clear Sky): increased store for 10 rounds, increased damage, 9x39 caliber change 
 
 
%c[255,255,255] •%c[default] Jaguar (Monolith): Increased damage, enlarged store by 15 bullets 
 
 
%c[255,1,255,255] •%c[default] Red Line (Duty): Increased damage, enlarged magazine for 15 cartridges, change of caliber to 9x39 
 
 
%c[255,1,255,255] •%c[default] Volcano (Freedom): increased damage, increased store by 15 bullets, change of caliber to 5.56x45 
 
 
%c[255,1,255,255] •%c[default] Deserted rebel (Mercenaries): increased damage, increased store by 15 rounds, shifts but the caliber of 9x39

%c[255,1,255,255] •%c[default] Camouflage "Aquamarine Revenge" 
%c[255,1,255,255] •%c[default] Increased the store by 5 cartridges 
%c[255,1,255,255] •%c[default] Increased damage by 6.66% 
%c[255,1,255,255] •%c[default] Changing the caliber to 5.56x45

%c[255,1,255,255]•%c[default] Camouflage "Elite outfit"
 
%c[255,1,255,255]•%c[default] Changing the caliber to 9x39 
%c[255,1,255,255]•%c[default] Increased damage by 10%
\n%c[255,1,255,255]•%c[default] Even my grandfather fought with this weapon. The stalkers received the nickname "Emerald curls" for drawing on the butt\n

A unique rifle M4 with a manually applied image in the style of hi-tech called "Azimov".
A rare M4 rifle with a hand-painted image called "The Deserted Attack". Used by special squads of mercenaries and freedom.
A unique rifle M4 with a hand-painted image of a Chinese dragon.
A rare M4 rifle with a hand-painted image called "The Deserted Attack". Used by special squads of mercenaries and freedom.
